subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] The first run of 25 as a system.
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Frank,

congrats on #25 I can hear those clear as you did. The
only one I differ on is "trying to hear us" on that
one I hear the end differently. I hear "trying to hear
us clearly, maybe let's talk faster first"

Flows pretty smooth so far. Yeah #2 was a bit harsh
LOL

Misty


--- Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:

> 
>  Stereo echo box speakers, and twin mic pick ups. I
> don't know if I like it. I think the echo box needs
> some work. I can't record record with my old tape
> deck, I have to use the boom box with stereo line
> inputs, or make an adapter cord for the old decks.
> This was AM linear mode.
>  
>  Frank-S
>
